# Peer Review / Inspection Plan

## Inspection Overview
- **Artifact:** (ex: Test Plan, Code Module, Requirements)
- **Date:**
- **Duration:** 

## Roles
- **Moderator:**
- **Author:**
- **Reviewer(s) (2-3):**
- **Recorder:**

## Initial Criteria
- Artifact completed
- Shared with reviewers at least 24 hours in advance
- Reviewers prepared

## Inspection Checklist
- Requirements clear and testable
- Test cases trace to requirements
- Edge cases covered
- No obvious omissions or ambiguities
